body:
That makes sense. One reason I'm hesitant to do this is we rely on the exit code for CI. So if we do `|| true`, we can't use this for CI. I did some googling and I don't think there is any way to keep the exit code but not have npm lose its shit.

I think a better approach would be using [therapist](https://github.com/rehandall/therapist) instead of npm scripts to run lints, once that is ready.
body_html:

I think a better approach would be using therapist instead of npm scripts to run lints, once that is ready.
